mapper.select: /* 글로벌 – 현지교류 리스트 조회 */ SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNUMBER , EXCH_PAGE.* FROM ( SELECT EXCH.EXCH_SN AS EXCH_SN , EXCH.EXCH_TTL AS EXCH_TTL , EXCH.EXCH_CN AS EXCH_CN , EXCH.EXPSR_YN AS EXPSR_YN , EXCH.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , FILES.FILE_PATH AS INTER_PATH1 , FILES.FILE_NM AS INTER_FILE_NAME1 FROM KB_EXCH_INFO EXCH , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE EXCH.ATCH_FILE_SN1 = FILES.FILE_SN(+) ORDER BY EXCH.EXCH_SN ASC ) EXCH_PAGE ORDER BY ROWNUMBER DESC

/* 글로벌 – 현지교류 상세 조회 */ SELECT EXCH.EXCH_SN AS EXCH_SN , EXCH.EXCH_TTL AS EXCH_TTL , EXCH.EXCH_CN AS EXCH_CN , EXCH.EXPSR_YN AS EXPSR_YN , EXCH.SORT_NO AS SORT_NO , EXCH.ATCH_FILE_SN1 AS ATCH_FILE_SN1 , FILES.FILE_PATH AS INTER_PATH1 , FILES.FILE_NM AS INTER_FILE_NAME1 FROM KB_EXCH_INFO EXCH , KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE EXCH.EXCH_SN = #{exch_sn} AND EXCH.ATCH_FILE_SN1 = FILES.FILE_SN(+)
